chapters.title: Chapter 15: Stronger than Written Law
chapters.info: Nisao Dachen, p. 312 (349)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She agreed to assist Myrelle with helping Lan because of problems she foresaw with his mind. Her specialty as a Yellow sister is psychiatric problems. She tried to help Egwene with her headaches, but could not find the cause of them.
